trans-unit.source: Sign ins from possibly infected devices
trans-unit.target: Sign ins from possibly infected devices

trans-unit.source: A report that includes sign in attempts that have been executed from devices on which some malware (malicious software) may be running.
trans-unit.target: A report that includes sign in attempts that have been executed from devices on which some malware (malicious software) may be running.

trans-unit.source: Sign ins from possibly infected devices
trans-unit.target: Sign ins from possibly infected devices

trans-unit.source: This report attempts to identify your users' devices that that have become infected and are now part of a botnet (also known as a zombie army).
trans-unit.target: This report attempts to identify your users' devices that that have become infected and are now part of a botnet (also known as a zombie army).

trans-unit.source: We correlate IP addresses of users' sign ins against IP addresses that we know to be in contact with botnet servers.
trans-unit.target: We correlate IP addresses of users' sign ins against IP addresses that we know to be in contact with botnet servers.

trans-unit.source: Recommendation: This report flags IP addresses, not user devices.
trans-unit.target: Recommendation: This report flags IP addresses, not user devices.

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you contact the user and scan all the user's devices to be certain.
trans-unit.target: We recommend that you contact the user and scan all the user's devices to be certain.

trans-unit.source: It is also possible that a user's personal device is infected, or that someone other than the user, who was using the same IP address as the user, has an infected device.
trans-unit.target: It is also possible that a user's personal device is infected, or that someone other than the user, who was using the same IP address as the user, has an infected device.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to address malware infections, see the [Malware Protection Center](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=335773).
trans-unit.target: For more information about how to address malware infections, see the [Malware Protection Center](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=335773).

trans-unit.source: Sign ins from possibly infected devices
trans-unit.target: Sign ins from possibly infected devices
